Mon, 16 Dec 2024 02:19:56 +0000 Sapper Brooking Poi from the East Coast has embarked on a plumbing career with the NZ Army thanks to advice he got while attending an EIT programme, and one day he intends to bring his skills back to Tairawhiti.
